scripts.test-docker: npm run docker-start && cross-env LIGHTHOUSEURL=https://localhost:8888 cross-env CI=true npm run test && npm run docker-stop
scripts.docker-start: docker ps --filter "name=lighthouse_test" --filter "status=running" -q > /dev/null || (docker start lighthouse_test || docker run -p 8888:5001 -d --restart always --name lighthouse_test ghcr.io/letpeoplework/lighthouse:dev-latest) && npx wait-on https://localhost:8888
scripts.docker-stop: docker stop lighthouse_test && docker rm lighthouse_test
scripts.docker-screenshots: npm run docker-start && cross-env LIGHTHOUSEURL=https://localhost:8888 cross-env CI=true npm run screenshots && npm run docker-stop
